bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers and Step-Voltage Regulators
IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers and Step-Voltage Regulators

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Bar code label requirements for specific types of distribution transformers and stepvoltageregulators are covered in this standard. Data content for temporary and permanent barcode labeling is described as well as bar code label print quality and durability requirements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.35-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.35-1996) - Redline
